body:

title: Does anyone us Teamspeak?

replies.body:
Donors can sometimes group in the suite.
Donate if you want to join xP
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: I think the donater rooms should be gotten rid of because it creates cliques in the community making it worse and not better which TS is supposed to do.
replies.body_tagged: I think the donater rooms should be gotten rid of because it creates cliques in the community making it worse and not better which TS is supposed to do.

replies.body:
There really isn't a whole lot of Team Speak players who frequently come on. The TS crew is already a clique. If a new player joins, we love to help him/her and make them feel welcome.
The Suite is a donor benefit. Most people that come on TS are donors anyway :P

replies.body: The reason we have a premium suite is so that donors get a benefit from donating. Donators are helping the server, and in return are getting back some extra options that normal players don't. That's why there are donators.... :P
replies.body_tagged: The reason we have a premium suite is so that donors get a benefit from donating. Donators are helping the server, and in return are getting back some extra options that normal players don't. That's why there are donators.... :P

replies.body:
http://bit.ly/1gPKtOM
A donation is a donation, you should expect nothing in return. However, we do get something in return. Isn't much of a donation knowing that you're going to get something in return. It's more like a purchase.

But I would like it if they added a "Registered" rank to TS. And replaced the Donor channel to "Registered Channel"
You would have to confirm with a moderator that you're this 'avicus player' in order to get the rank. To avoid a bunch of trolls coming into a "Confirmed Avicus Chat".

replies.body:
I am not a donor but use teamspeak. I only use cursing forbidden because my parents think that since I am twelve, I need to show them it is appropriate. Feel free to talk to me. I don't have skype and on teamspeak I mostly to nebula gameplay. I also use the chat.
TheoLucy
